

``repos_front`` move vars to front
Description
move vars to front
#### Usage
repos_front(data, ...)
Arguments
data data frame
... columns to move to front
Value
Reordered data frame.
Examples
## data with row names
d <- data.frame(x = rnorm(5), y = rnorm(5), row.names = letters[1:5])
## move y to front
repos_front(d, y)
